Articles.Content:
I modeled a part in which I wish to animate when activated via right-click menu and/or action group hotkey.

I have VS2013 installed and adequate C# experience, but I just can't figure out how to get animations to work.

could someone please post some sample code for me to learn from?

I modeled a part in which I wish to animate when activated via right-click menu and/or action group hotkey.

I have VS2013 installed and adequate C# experience, but I just can't figure out how to get animations to work.

could someone please post some sample code for me to learn from?

This is made in the config of the part by adding a module 'ModuleAnimateGeneric'. See more details on the wiki. I don't think you need C# experience for that since everything you can change is in the config of the part. I think you'll have more informations in the 'Modelling anTexturing' section than here.

Edited July 4, 2015 by simon56modder
You don't need C#, you can animate in unity. Window... Animation.
